song_name: Don't Stand So Close To Me
metrics_conclusion: Don't Stand So Close To Me has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Don't Stand So Close To Me has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Minor,  and D Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
